sprunked-2-0.title: Sprunked 2.0 (Sprunked 2.0)
sprunked-2-0.slogan: 沉浸在Sprunked 2.0 (Incredibox 模組) 的暗黑音效之中！(Immerse Yourselves in the Dark Sounds of Sprunked 2.0 (Incredibox Mod)!)
sprunked-2-0.description: 體驗 Sprunked 2.0 增強的領域，改版角色和加強的恐怖視覺效果融合，創造沉浸式遊戲冒險。(Experience the enhanced realm of Sprunked 2.0 where revamped characters and intensified horror visuals merge to create an immersive gameplay adventure.)

HomeIframe.title: Sprunked 2.0：步入黑暗
HomeIframe.description: 深入 Sprunked 2.0 神秘的世界，其陰暗的環境和令人毛骨悚然的聲音，處處充滿謎團。(Dive into the enigmatic world of Sprunked 2.0 with its shadowy settings and haunting sounds where mystery awaits at every turn.)

HomeFeatures.whatIsDescription: Sprunked 2.0 (Incredibox 模組)帶領玩家進入更黑暗的領域，並重新設計角色以及令人毛骨悚然的視覺效果。此模組透過陰森的風景加強懸疑感。(Sprunked 2.0 Mod of Incredibox introduces a darker realm with redesigned characters and haunting visuals. This mod heightens suspense with eerie landscapes.)
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep1: 選擇改版角色：從眾多經過改版的角色中選擇，豐富懸疑和音樂深度。(Choose Enhanced Characters: Pick from an array of overhauled characters that enrich the suspense and musical depth.)
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep2: 混搭音效：拖曳並放下音效，創造令人毛骨悚然的配樂，並以令人難忘的節奏為特色。(Mix and Match Sounds: Drag and drop to build an eerie soundtrack characterized by haunting beats.)
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep3: 解鎖恐怖獎勵：獨特的組合角色，揭示特殊效果和動畫。(Unlock Horror Bonuses: Combine characters uniquely to unveil special effects and animations.)
HomeFeatures.feature1Description: 每個角色都經過恐怖風格的重新設計，以提升遊戲的陰森氛圍。(Each character has been crafted with a horror-inspired redesign to elevate the game's chilling atmosphere.)
HomeFeatures.feature2Description: 深暗陰影的藝術風格創造出沉浸式且令人毛骨悚然的環境。(Dark, shadowed art styles create an immersive, suspenseful environment.)
HomeFeatures.feature3Description: 更豐富的音景提供創作深刻令人難忘的混音。(Richer soundscapes provide options for crafting deep, haunting mixes.)
HomeFeatures.feature4Description: 發現隱藏的組合，啟用獨特的動畫和音效，非常適合恐怖主題。(Discover hidden combos that activate unique animations and sounds, perfect for the horror theme.)
